mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cl_num, cl_name, cl_id, cl_wdate, cl_passwd, cl_stat, ( select sum([win_cnt]) from tb_reserve_cnt TC where TC.cl_no=CL.cl_num and TC.rc_date >= #{befor1month} and #{after14days} > TC.rc_date ) as real_cnt, ( select count(*) from tb_reserve_time TRT,tb_reserve TR where TR.re_num=TRT.re_num and TR.cl_num=CL.cl_num and TR.re_date >= #{befor1month} ) as cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cl_num DESC) AS rownum FROM tb_club CL (nolock)
) AS NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_club (cl_name, cl_wdate, cl_id, cl_passwd, cl_stat) VALUES (#{cl_name}, CONVERT(CHAR(8), getdate(), 112), #{cl_id}, #{cl_passwd}, #{cl_stat} )
